chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

The phone was in excellent condition when purchased. However, it only has a maximum battery capacity of 85%, which is not sufficient for its excellent condition!

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
